fluency: It is an investment in world liberty and world peace.

original: The assistance that I am recommending for Greece and Turkey amounts to little more than 1 tenth of 1 per cent of this investment.
standard: The help I propose for Greece and Turkey amounts to just over 1 tenth of 1 per cent of this sum.
fluency: The assistance that I recommend to Greece and Turkey amounts to little more than 1 tenth of 1% of this investment.

original: It is only common sense that we should safeguard this investment and make sure that it was not in vain.
standard: It is only common sense that we should safeguard this investment and ensure that it is not in vain.
fluency: It is only common sense that we should safeguard this investment and ensure that it is not in vain.

original: The seeds of totalitarian regimes are nurtured by misery and want.
standard: The seeds of totalitarian regimes are nurtured by poverty and want.
fluency: The seeds of totalitarian regimes are nurtured by poverty and want.

original: They spread and grow in the evil soil of poverty and strife.
standard: They spread and grow in the evil soil of poverty and conflict.
fluency: They spread and grow in the evil soil of poverty and conflict.

original: They reach their full growth when the hope of a people for a better life has died.
standard: When a people's hope for a better life has died, they attain their maximum growth.
fluency: They reach their full growth when people's hopes for a better life have died.

original: We must keep that hope alive.
standard: We have to keep the dream alive.
fluency: We have to keep the dream alive.

original: The free peoples of the world look to us for support in maintaining their freedoms.
standard: The world's free peoples look to us for help in protecting their freedoms.
fluency: The world's free peoples look to us for help in protecting their freedoms.

original: If we falter in our leadership, we may endanger the peace of the world -- and we shall surely endanger the welfare of our own nation.
standard: If we falter in our leadership, we could endanger the world's peace — and we will definitely endanger our own nation's welfare.
fluency: If we falter in our leadership, we may endanger the peace of the world — and surely endanger the welfare of our own nation.

original: Great responsibilities have been placed upon us by the swift movement of events.
standard: The rapid movement of events has placed great responsibility on us.
fluency: The rapid movement of events has placed great responsibility on us.

original: I am confident that the Congress will face these responsibilities squarely.
standard: I am confident that the Congress will face up to these responsibilities.
fluency: I am confident that the Congress will face up to these responsibilities.
